name: Rule Arcade
description:
Use Mouse & Keyboard - (Backspace & Esc)

This project tests out an idea for discovering rules through playing with varying difficulty.

You get to discover and track which rules are defined by each letter, confirming your theories through testing and re-evaluating.

There is currently no failure state making this prototype more of a sandbox to test out and explore.

Any comments would be helpful! This prototype is made to discover what makes discovery fun in gameplay.
